body.p: To his Excellency Beriah Magoffin Govenor of Kentucky:

respectfully your petitioner William Rogers represents that at the late July Term of the Mason Circuit Court he was fined by said court the sum of twenty five dollars for an assault and Battery upon John Sweet. Sweet called him a thief and other opprobious epithets, smarting under this language he struck him but one blow, this was done upon an election day upon his return home and after Sweet had drawn a large knife upon one of the company -- he most respectfully solicits you to remit said fine
The undersigned concur in the foregoing petition
